title: Chantilly (Virginia)
extract:
Chantilly is a city in Fairfax County, Virginia near Dulles International Airport.  The Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center of the National Air and Space Museum is the most popular attraction in Chantilly.


Get in

The Dulles International Airport (IAD IATA) is close to the Air and Space Museum.  To get to the museum from the airport, take Fairfax Connector bus 983.


By bus
Fairfax Connector is the local bus service. A few useful routes: #650 connects to the Metro Orange Line at Vienna/Fairfax-GMU station, #901 connects to the Metro Silver Line at Herndon station, and #983 runs between the Udvar-Hazy Center (see below) and Dulles Airport.


By car


Get around
Car - A car would be the best mode of transportation in Chantilly.


See
1 Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center - National Air and Space Museum, 14390 Air and Space Museum Parkway, ☏ +1 202 357-2200. 10AM-5:30PM. Located near Dulles International Airport, this Smithsonian museum opened in 2003 to house many illustrious air/spacecraft that would not fit into the 1976 museum in the National Mall. The Udvar-Hazy collection includes the SR-71 "Blackbird" spy plane, the Concorde supersonic jet, the Enola Gay B-29, the Super Constellation, and the space shuttle Discovery. In addition, the museum contain an observation tower and an IMAX theater. The museum is free; there is a charge for the IMAX. Parking is available for $15/vehicle.Public transportation to the Udvar-Hazy Center from Washington DC is now relatively easy; take the Silver Line Metro train to Innovation Center, then catch the 983 Fairfax Connector bus to the Udvar-Hazy Center. Buses run every 30 min M-F and once an hour on weekends. The 983 bus also stops at Dulles Airport, so it can be used by visitors with a layover there.   
2 Ox Hill Battlefield Park (Chantilly Battlefield Park), 4134 West Ox Road, ☏ +1 703 324-8700. A 5-acre (2-ha) farmland on which a major Civil War battle took place   
3 Ellanor C. Lawrence Park. Ellanor C. Lawrence Park is a large area preserved for the multitude of wild animals and plants. The park has various historic buildings, such as a smokehouse, dairy complex, beehives and gardens. It also has multiple sport fields and hiking trails. It has meadow, ponds, and a forest.   

4 Sully Historic Site (Sully Plantation), ☏ +1 703 437-1794. Is the house of Richard Bland Lee, the first North Virginia Congressman. The house reflects the historic era and style, consisting of authentic antique furniture and utensils.   


Do
 Pleasant Valley Golfer’s Club at Richard Jones Park, 4715 Pleasant Valley Drive. Pleasant Valley Golfer's Club is privately own, with 18-holes. 
Hiking, biking, and camping are various outdoor activities that can be done at Ellanor C. Lawrence Park.


Buy
Shayan Oriental Rugs & Antiques - 14240 Sullyfield Cir # J
DJ Feathers Aviary - 14240-P Sullyfield Circle


Eat
American food

 Bob Evans Restaurant, 14050 Thunderbolt Pl (American). 
Asian Food

Otani Japanese Steak House - 13952 Lee Jackson Memoria (Japanese)
Wong Kok Asia Cuisine - 43090 Peacock Market Plz (Chinese/Japanese)
 China Cafe, 13997 Metrotech Dr. 
Italian and pizza

 Buon Appetito Ny Pizza, 13932 Metrotech Dr (Italian). 
Mexican food

Anita's New Mexico Style Mexican Food, Inc - 13921 Lee Jackson Memoria (Mexican)
 El Fresco Mexican Grill, 13970 Metrotech Dr (Mexican). Local restaurant; tasty, cheap lunch specials. 
Cafe & deli

 Checkers Deli & Cafe, 4270 Henninger Ct. 


Drink
 Bungalow Billiards & Brew Co, 13891 Metrotech Dr. The Bungalow Billiards and Brew Co is a billiards, bar, and restaurant consisting primarily of American food. 


Sleep
 Fairfield Inn & Suites Dulles Airport Chantilly, 3960 Corsair Court. Check-in: +1-703-435-8581. Free Dulles airport shuttle, continental breakfast daily, free high-speed Wi-Fi access. 
 Comfort Suites Chantilly-Dulles Airport, 13980 Metrotech Drive. 
 Extended Stay America, 14420 Chantilly Crossing Lane. 
 Extended Stay Deluxe – Chantilly, 4506 Brookfield Corporate Drive. 
 Hampton Inn Dulles South, 4050 Westfax Drive. 
Holiday Inn Select Chantilly, 4335 Chantilly Shopping Center
Homestead Studio Suites, 4504 Brookfield Corporate Drive
Hyatt Place Dulles Airport South, 4994 Westone Plaza
 Staybridge Suites Chantilly, 3860 Centerview Drive. 
1 Westfields Marriott Washington Dulles, 14750 Conference Center Drive, ☏ +1 703-818-0300. Check-in: 4PM, check-out: noon. Offers over 40,000 sq ft of event space and 31 meeting rooms for weddings and conferences. 
 Wingate by Wyndham Chantilly, 3940 Centerview Drive, ☏ +1 571-203-0999. Check-in: 3PM, check-out: noon. The Wingate is 4 miles from the Dulles Airport and offers free airport shuttle and wireless internet. $95-150. 


Connect


Go next
Centreville
Fairfax has the most activities to do and places to see.
Herndon has a great farm attraction. The farm is called Frying Pan Park and Kidwell Farm
Reston is a good little escape for a small town center with good restaurants.
